official_title: Resolved, that pursuant to the Legislative Pay Act of 1929, as amended, effective immediately, Walter P. Kennedy is hereby designated floor assistant to the minority (Minority Sergeant at Arms) to receive gross compensation of $36,000 per annum until otherwise ordered by the House.

summary.text: Designates Walter P. Kennedy as assistant to the Minority Sergeant-at-Arms.

titles.title: Resolved, that pursuant to the Legislative Pay Act of 1929, as amended, effective immediately, Walter P. Kennedy is hereby designated floor assistant to the minority (Minority Sergeant at Arms) to receive gross compensation of $36,000 per annum until otherwise ordered by the House.
